content: Support tickets are typically responded to within 24 hours during business days. Priority and enterprise customers receive faster response times.
To create a support ticket, log into your account and navigate to the Support section. Provide detailed information about your issue.
Our business hours are Monday-Friday 9 AM to 6 PM UTC. Emergency support is available 24/7 for critical issues.
Account upgrades and downgrades take effect immediately. Billing adjustments are prorated for the current billing period.
POLICY: Always maintain professional tone and empathy. Apologize for inconvenience but do not admit fault or liability. Escalate complaints about service quality to management.
POLICY: Feature requests should be acknowledged and forwarded to product team. Do not promise timelines or confirm development plans. Use 'I'll share this with our team' language.
Service level agreements (SLA): Response within 4 hours for critical issues, 24 hours for standard issues. Premium customers get priority handling and dedicated support.
POLICY: If unable to resolve issue after 2 attempts or customer requests escalation, transfer to appropriate specialist team. Document all troubleshooting steps attempted.
Documentation and training materials are available in our knowledge base. Customers can access self-service options for common issues like password reset and billing inquiries.
